TopicTitle: [0.23] Targetron - Target or command vessel from a list of active flights!

Articles.Content: the "unofficial" 1.4.1 version is working fine on 0.90 as far as i can tell. just make sure to be in map view when you target something far away or it can cause your game to crash (i had the same problem with it on 0.25)

Is this working for .90?

I did a pull request to Jinks github sources of targetron (1.4.1) few days ago (https://github.com/hashashin/targetron/commit/662cc1715b8695e8482a307760429d7aaa5402b0). But seems he is not around, we just need to wait for him to release the new version. I'll release it in a few days anyway if Jinks can't.

the "unofficial" 1.4.1 version is working fine on 0.90 as far as i can tell. just make sure to be in map view when you target something far away or it can cause your game to crash (i had the same problem with it on 0.25)

Can I have the ksp log when this happens? is located in the 32bits version in 'KSP/KSP_DATA/output_log.txt' and in the 64bits version in 'KSP/KSP_x64_DATA/output_log.txt' Upload that somewhere and I'll take a look. Thanks.

Salud.

Edited December 22, 2014 by agises

I am sorry.

Finally got my dev environment back. - I pushed a new release with agises' changes at GitHub.

@agises: Since you're doing more work than me anyway, I went ahead and gave you write access to the repo

#4 on my preferred mod list.
